data.title: The Most Important Current Affairs January 2020: Union Budget 2020-21: Important Highlights
data.meta_description: jan - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document summarizes the key highlights of the Union Budget 2020-21 presented by the Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman. Some of the important points included reduced income tax rates, increased tax benefits for affordable housing, increased capital expenditure for infrastructure development, measures for boosting agriculture and rural development, increased allocation for healthcare, education and skill development. The budget aimed to promote aspirational India, economic development for all and a caring society.
data.text: The Most Important Current Affairs January 2020: Union Budget 2020-21: Important Highlights
